name: Crispy Goblin Merchant
description:
Controls: Right Click - Spawn Lava

Hold Left Click - Drag R -Restart Idea:

A small game about using your health to spawn lava in order to burn a goblin while protecting a girl.

Watch out! Don't burn the girl!

Made in 72 hours for MiniJam92

Theme: Death
Limitation: Health is your weapon

KarimZoPr0 - Coding/Level Design/Game Design

Galomortal - Art
